title: Charming Studio in Wilda’s Historic Residence with Terrace
description: Step into this captivating studio apartment, seamlessly blending historic charm with modern convenience in the heart of Wilda. With a smart and airy 33 sqm layout, this home offers comfort and functionality, featuring 1 cozy bedroom and a well-appointed bathroom. French doors lead to a private balcony and terrace, opening to leafy views and natural light. Residents enjoy streamlined access to communal amenities, including a dedicated laundry room and, uniquely, a beautifully maintained shared swimming pool on-site.
neighborhood_description: Located in Poznan’s sought-after Wilda neighborhood, this property sits in a peaceful yet well-connected area popular with expats. Family-friendly with a relaxed ambiance, Wilda is close to top local schools and everyday amenities such as cafes, parks, and essential shops. The neighborhood boasts robust public transport links and extensive bike lanes, making commuting into the city center or leisure outings attractively convenient.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for expats seeking character and convenience
active social scene in the residence
target_buyer: Suitable for expats or young professionals wishing to live in a picturesque, calm, and international-friendly neighborhood near the center of Poznan.
market_positioning: An exceptional find with an authentic historic touch and desirable amenities, this apartment caters to the niche market of buyers seeking well-located properties with communal lifestyle benefits in an urban neighborhood without city-center bustle.
